Text:
Whoever uploaded this is an asshole. The MKV is corrupted so that when you try to seek to any part of the movie it just goes back to 0:00 and there is no English subs in the container. Instead some asshole remuxed it with Romanian subs and got rid of the english ones.

Thanks for wasting my time dickfuck!

The movie will play in VLC but you have 0 control, you cant skip ahead only back up from what you've already watched. Fucking L A M E!
